column6: lines 26-31: could we group them into "bank fees" but still make it so that cleo could break down the type of fee if the user asked? could see this being a very useful conversation we could have with users

column6: just one opinion but i don't think we should group entertainment. each of these could pave the way for really valuable, targeted convos - especially since a good portion of our users participate in gambling/lottery (based on info from a hype survey from a while back)
